t: Amazon Meltable Mastery: How to Sell Heat-Sensitive Products
s: April 19, 2024 - Amazon Meltable Products are products that are sensitive to high temperatures and can melt during shipment. These products require special handling and storage to ensure that they arrive at their destination in good condition. Some examples of meltable products include chocolate, gummy candies, and certain types of cosmetics.
